def_cn: （某优质葡萄酒的）产地和年份;特定年份酿的葡萄酒
def_en: The vintage of a good quality wine is the year and place that it was made before being stored to improve it. You can also use vintage to refer to the wine that was made in a certain year.

def_cn: （葡萄酒）优质的，上等的，佳酿的
def_en: Vintage wine is good quality wine that has been stored for several years in order to improve its quality.

def_cn: （汽车或飞机)老式的，古色古香的
def_en: Vintage cars or aeroplanes are old but are admired because they are considered to be the best of their kind.
You can use vintage to describe something which is the best and most typical of its kind.
